about_the_game:
Redirect is a visually captivating 2D puzzle game that puts your creativity and problem-solving skills to the test. Set in a world inspired by futuristic laboratories and serene natural backdrops, you’ll manipulate light and shadows to unlock doors, solve complex challenges, and reveal hidden pathways.

Key Features:

  • Light Manipulation Mechanics: Redirect beams of light across various surfaces, solving intricate puzzles to progress.

  • Immersive Environments: Start on the surface with breathtaking views of nature through glass windows, then dive into high-tech, atmospheric labs inspired by Portal 2's iconic aesthetic.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Experiment with angles, mirrors, and prisms to guide light to its destination, all while managing your resources and time.

  • Exploration and Discovery: Uncover secrets within each level as you explore interconnected puzzles and uncover the story of your environment.

  • Unique Player Character: Play as a minimalistic yet charming block, embodying the simplicity and elegance of the game's design.

Redirect isn’t just about puzzles—it’s a journey of discovery, exploration, and mastering the power of light. Are you ready to shine your way to the end?

Coming Soon: More Levels, New Mechanics, and Community Challenges!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ compatible GPU (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
